title: PathFactory Visitor Fieldgroup Details - V1.1
description: This schema field is a critical component of the PathFactory platform's visitor tracking and personalization framework. It represents specific attributes or data points within the visitor schema that PathFactory uses to understand and categorize user interactions. These schema fields are essential for tailoring content experiences, enabling personalized pathways, and capturing insights into visitor behavior. The data collected through these fields helps in building comprehensive visitor profiles, facilitating targeted marketing efforts, and enhancing the overall user journey on the platform.

pathfactory:visitor.title: Pathfactory Visitor
pathfactory:visitor.description: Pathfactory Visitor Object is used to get all the information related to Visitor which can be used for the analytics purpose and for more personalised user exeprience

xdm:createdAtUTC.description: Defines the Date in UTC format when a new Visitor is created in PathFactory platform
xdm:createdAtUTC.title: Created At (UTC)

xdm:emailDomain.description: Defines the email domain of a Visitor
xdm:emailDomain.title: Email Domain

xdm:email.description: Defines the email address of a Visitor
xdm:email.title: Email

xdm:visitorECID.description: Defines the Adobe ECID of a Visitor
xdm:visitorECID.title: Adobe ECID

xdm:lastVisitTimeUTC.description: Defines the Date in UTC format when Visitor last visited any page in PathFactory platform
xdm:lastVisitTimeUTC.title: Last Visit Time (UTC)

xdm:visitorID.description: Defines the unique ID assigned to a Visitor
xdm:visitorID.title: Visitor ID

xdm:visitorUUID.description: Defines the 128 bit unique ID assigned to a Visitor
xdm:visitorUUID.title: Visitor UUID

xdm:visitorIdentity.description: Defines the unique Identity assigned to a Visitor in PathFactory platform
xdm:visitorIdentity.title: Visitor Identity

xdm:isKnown.description: Boolean variable to check if the Visitor is already known to the PathFactory platform or not
xdm:isKnown.title: Is Known

xdm:knownFrom.description: Defines the Date in general format since when the Visitor is known to the PathFactory platform
xdm:knownFrom.title: Known From

xdm:firstVisitTimeUTC.description: Defines the Date in UTC format when the Visitor first visited any page in PathFactory platform
xdm:firstVisitTimeUTC.title: First Visit Time (UTC)

xdm:identityECID.description: Defines the unique ECID assigned to a Visitor
xdm:identityECID.title: Identity ECID
